meanings.definition: A person who abhors or detests something.
meanings.sent1: She is an abhorrer of horror movies.
meanings.sent2: The abhorrer of spicy food always opts for mild dishes.
meanings.sent3: The abhorrer of early mornings set multiple alarms to wake up on time.
meanings.sent4: As an abhorrer of lies, he always seeks the truth.
meanings.sent5: The abhorrer of injustice fights for equality for all.

meanings.definition: To regard with extreme repugnance or aversion.
meanings.sent1: I abhorrer the taste of olives.
meanings.sent3: The cat abhorrers taking baths and always hides when it's bath time.
meanings.sent4: He abhorrers the idea of giving up on his dreams.
meanings.sent5: The abhorrer of chaos always keeps a tidy workspace.
